title: Apartment for Sale in Colombo 04 (Prime Location)
details:
A Fully Furnished, 2 Bedroom apartment for Immediate Sale (710 Square Feet)
Located in a Prime Location in Bambalapitya (Colombo 04) with access to Galle Road (25 Meters) and Marine Drive

Located on the 7th Floor of a 8 Story Apartment Complex
(2 Bedrooms / 2 Bathrooms)
Clean Deed
Master Bedroom with Attached Bathroom
Common Bathroom (hot water), Dining, a Spacious sitting (hall) area and Kitchen
Teak Furniture

Rooftop Terrace on the 8th Floor
Intercom and CCTV Surveillance & Security Provided 25x2
Accessible via 2 Gates
2 Lifts Operational 24x7, Common Electricity, Common water supply & Garbage Disposal
Good Access to Public Transport
Close Proximity to St Pauls Church/ Nimal Rd Mosque/Asokaramaya Temple

Very Well Maintained Apartment Complex with Clean Surrounding and a peaceful environment

Walking distance from Banks (HNB/Commercial), Supermarkets (Keels/Sathosa), Laundry and Schools (Vishaka Vidyalaya/HFC/St Pauls/Hindu College/St Peters/MLC)

Expecting 20.0 Million (Or best Offer)
